item.title: Week 11 Data Publishing, Replication, Reproducibility
item.description: Goals Listen Read Do Reflect Report Back Goals for this week This week, I want to spend some time thinking about how archaeologists make their data available - or not - for replication of their studies. After all, excavation is destruction. Listen You’ve did it gang; you’ve reached the end. This week’s podcast features three amazing digital archaeologists, and one evil villain. Your browser does not support the audio element.
